meaning: an inner feeling or voice viewed as acting as a guide to the rightness or wrongness of one's behavior.
evoking a keen sense of sadness or regret.
the subjects comprising a course of study in a school or college.
(of a person, manner, or gesture) feeling or revealing an overt and often offensive sexual desire.
used as a greeting or to begin a phone conversation.
(chiefly of a drug or medicine) tending to stimulate or facilitate evacuation of the bowels.
